code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Admin}from'./admin';import{useData,useUpdate}from"../../hook/hook";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function Admins(){const[mobil,setTitle]=useState(null);const{data,refetch}=useData();const{mutate:updateItem,isPending}=useUpdate();const[nomre,setnomre]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{if(data){console.log(data,'data');setnomre(data[0]);}},[data]);const handleUpdate=()=>{updateItem({id:nomre===null||nomre===void 0?void 0:nomre.id,data:{mobil}},{onSuccess:()=>{alert("✅ Başarıyla güncellendi!");refetch();},onError:err=>{console.error(err);alert("❌ Güncelleme hatası!");}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"admin-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["hazirki nomre:",nomre===null||nomre===void 0?void 0:nomre.mobil]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"input-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:mobil,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),placeholder:"nomreni yaz"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"button-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleUpdate,disabled:isPending,children:isPending?"Yenilenir...":"Yenile"})})]})});}
